sentences.sContent: Check the expiry date for all foam extinguisher.
sentences.sContent_eng: Check the expiry date for all foam extinguisher.
sentences.sCn: 检查所有泡沫灭火器的过期时间。

sentences.sContent: They threw eggs, sticks, bottles and a fire extinguisher at the police.
sentences.sContent_eng: They threw eggs, sticks, bottles and a fire extinguisher at the police.
sentences.sCn: 他们向警察投掷了鸡蛋，木棍，酒瓶和一些灭火器。

sentences.sContent: Abstr: The text elaborated the basic step of the high civil building extinguisher distribution design, and illustrate with example.
sentences.sContent_eng: Abstr: The text elaborated the basic step of the high civil building extinguisher distribution design, and illustrate with example.
sentences.sCn: 文章摘要： 本文阐述了高层民用建筑灭火器配置设计的基本步骤，并举例说明。

remMethod.val: 来自extinguish(vt. 熄灭； 消灭)
